response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high quality and unique features, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $15,000. This offer is valid for a limited time, so please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
